channel.title: Adam Clayton on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Adam Clayton on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: U2’s Bono, The Edge, Adam Clayton and Larry Muller Jr. Release Statements on Israel and Gaza
item.description: “We are not experts in the politics of the region, but we want our audience to know where we each stand,” the band said in a joint introduction to the individual statements.
